label: NameService.sol
description: Human-readable identity system with username registration and metadata management

link.description: The Name Service provides a comprehensive identity system for the EVVM ecosystem, enabling users to register human-readable usernames, manage custom metadata schemas, and participate in a decentralized marketplace for username trading. It integrates seamlessly with EVVM Core for username-based payments, implements time-delayed governance for administrative security, and supports extensible metadata systems for rich user profiles and application-specific data storage.
